snippet: A judge said Robert Sims, who was given three years in prison, became part of an angry mob in the 2013 attack in Upper Manhattan.
abstract: Robert Sims, final defendant in 2013 motorcycle gang assault of SUV driver on West Side Highway, delivers tearful courtroom apology before being sentenced to three and a half years in state prison by New York State Supreme Court Justice Maxwell Wiley.
lead_paragraph: A judge said Robert Sims, who was given three years in prison, became part of an angry mob in the 2013 attack in Upper Manhattan.

headline.main: Final Biker Is Sentenced in Assault on S.U.V. Driver
headline.print_headline: Final Motorcyclist Sentenced in ’13 Assault on S.U.V. Driver
